data.title: Russian River Cruises
data.text:
Caesar Travel From Moscow 3-11 day river cruises

Fleet Foto Fleet Photo Russia's river ship fleet, shipowners, shipyards, tour operators

GAMA GAMA one of the largest Russian river cruises organizers on the rivers Volga, Oka, Kama, large own fleet

Infofolot Infofolot 3000 domestic river cruises aboard about 100 motor boats every year on the Volga, the Kama, Don, the Oka and smaller rivers, lakes Ladoga and Onega, famous canals

Kama Travel Kama Travel From the city of PERM on the river Kama 3-18 day river cruises eg Perm - St.Peterburg, Nizhny Novgorod, Kazan

LATTI LATTI, located in St.Petersburg, offers 1000 routes with over 100 ships on the rivers and lakes of Russia

Lenaturflot Lenaturflot From Yakutsk river cruises on the Lena, 2 to 15 day trips, as well as Liniendienste on the Lena

Mosturflot Mosturflot Moscow River Shipping Company and Mosturflot Cruise Company, - river cruises to / from Moscow, eg St.Petersburg, Volgograd, Rostov - with a fleet of eight ships

ORTHODOX Cruise Company ORTHODOX Cruise Company Moscow - St.Petersburg River Cruises u.a.

Ros Voyazh Ros Voyazh with their fleet from Samara river cruises on the Volga

Sputnik Germes Sputnik Germes From Samara on the Volga, operates four ships

Sputnik RMK Sputnik RMK from Perm at the Kama River, the shipping company operates four river ships, cruising from 3 to 20 days

Vodohod Vodohod fleet of modern river ships built in Austria - cruises on Volga, Neva and many more russian rivers and lakes

Volga Dream Volga Dream River cruise on the Volga with the 4 + * MS Volga Dream

Volgaples Volgaples three river boats, driving from Yaroslavl, Samara, Nishi Novgorod, 3 to 15 day river cruises
